The Difference Between Me and You

In the year 2017, Sam Smith is a transgender girl that moves from a previous school to have a fresh start in a school in London. She leaves her old school, friends, teachers and makes the brave move to Enrich Academy. Whilst she is at the school, she battles with depression, bullies and losing the love of her life who is also her best friend.
